languages.text: В этот раз зловещее зеркало не доставляет хлопот. Сервиторы дотаскивают его до мусоросброса и отправляют за борт. Авгуры показывают, что в полете зеркало продолжает выделять биомассу — однако на корабле более ничего странного не происходит. Можно продолжать полет.

This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.
languages.original_text: В этот раз зловещее зеркало не доставляет хлопот. Сервиторы дотаскивают его до мусоросброса и отправляют за борт. Авгуры показывают, что в полете зеркало продолжает выделять биомассу — однако на корабле более ничего странного не происходит. Можно продолжать полет.

traits.locale_text: This time the accursed mirror does not pose a threat. Servitors take it to the disposal chute and throw it away. The augur detects the mirror is still leaking biomass as it flies through the void. Among it are the fast-growing mold spores. The crew can now continue their journey.

This time the accursed mirror does not pose a threat. Servitors take it to the disposal chute and throw it away. The augur detects the mirror is still leaking biomass as it flies through the void. Among it are the fast-growing mold spores. The crew can now continue their journey.

This time the accursed mirror does not pose a threat. Servitors take it to the disposal chute and throw it away. The augur detects the mirror is still leaking biomass as it flies through the void, although nothing else strange has happened on the ship. The crew can now continue their journey.

This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

languages.text: 这一次，这面邪恶的镜子没有造成任何麻烦。机仆们把它拖到了排污槽，将镜子扔出了飞船。俄歇矩阵依然时时刻刻对飞船之外的镜子进行扫描。扫描结果显示，镜子依然在泄漏生物物质。不过，飞船上所有的怪事都已经结束了，船员们可以继续前进了。
languages.original_text: This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: 这一次，这面邪恶的镜子没有造成任何麻烦。奴工们把它拖到了排污槽，将镜子扔出了飞船。俄歇矩阵依然时时刻刻对飞船之外的镜子进行扫描。扫描结果显示，镜子依然在泄漏生物物质。不过，飞船上所有的怪事都已经结束了，船员们可以继续前进了。

languages.text: Esta vez el siniestro espejo no causa ningún problema. Los servidores lo arrastran al conducto de desechos, por donde lo expulsan de la nave. Los augures siguen al espejo durante su vuelo por el vacío, indicando que sigue despidiendo materia orgánica. En cualquier caso, los incidentes extraños de la nave llegan a su fin y la tripulación puede continuar su viaje.
languages.original_text: This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: Esta vez el siniestro espejo no causa ningún problema. Los servidores lo arrastran al conducto de desechos, por donde lo expulsan de la nave. Los augures siguen al espejo durante su vuelo por el vacío, indicando que sigue despidiendo materia orgánica. En cualquier caso, los incidentes extraños de la nave llegan a su fin y la tripulación puede continuar su viaje.

languages.text: 今度こそ不吉な鏡がトラブルを起こすことはない。サーヴィターが廃棄用シュートまで引きずり、そこから投棄した。落下する鏡をスキャナーが追跡すると、まだバイオマターが漏れ出ていることが示される。しかし、船内での奇妙な事件はすべて解決し、クルーは旅を続けることができるようになった。
languages.original_text: This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: 今度こそ不吉な鏡がトラブルを起こすことはない。サーヴィターが廃棄用シュートまで引きずり、そこから投棄した。落下する鏡をスキャナーが追跡すると、まだバイオマターが漏れ出ていることが示される。しかし、船内での奇妙な事件はすべて解決し、クルーは旅を続けることができるようになった。

languages.text: Dieses Mal macht der grauenhafte Spiegel keinen Ärger. Servitoren schleppen ihn zur Müllrutsche und werfen ihn über Bord. Auguren verfolgen die Flugbahn des Spiegels und bemerken, dass er noch immer Biomasse absondert. Alle merkwürdigen Vorfälle auf dem Schiff sind jedoch Geschichte, und die Crew kann ihre Reise fortsetzen.
languages.original_text: This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Mal macht der grauenhafte Spiegel keinen Ärger. Servitoren schleppen ihn zur Müllrutsche und werfen ihn über Bord. Auguren verfolgen die Flugbahn des Spiegels und bemerken, dass er noch immer Biomasse absondert. Alle merkwürdigen Vorfälle auf dem Schiff sind jedoch Geschichte, und die Crew kann ihre Reise fortsetzen.

languages.text: Cette fois-ci, le sinistre miroir ne cause pas de problème. Les servitors l'emmènent jusqu'à la trappe d'évacuation, où ils le laissent tomber. Les augures traquent le miroir pendant sa chute et indiquent qu'il émet encore de la biomatière. Cependant, les incidents étranges qui avaient lieu sur le vaisseau ont pris fin, et l'équipage peut maintenant poursuivre son voyage.
languages.original_text: This time the sinister mirror does not cause any trouble. Servitors drag it to the disposal chute, where they jettison it. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: Cette fois-ci, le sinistre miroir ne cause pas de problème. Les serviteurs l'emmènent jusqu'à la trappe d'évacuation, où ils le laissent tomber. Les augures traquent le miroir pendant sa chute et indiquent qu'il émet encore de la biomatière. Cependant, les incidents étranges qui avaient lieu sur le vaisseau ont pris fin, et l'équipage peut maintenant poursuivre son voyage.
